attributes.action: Companies Convicted of Telephone-Hacking should loose all financial benefits
attributes.additional_details:
Any company guilty of instructing employees, (or others), convicted of telephone hacking British individuals should loose all UK financial benefits in whatever form: to include tax allowances and business concessions, UK central and local government aid, planning assistance whether currently received or pending.

No UK tax payer should have to contribute to companies who willfuly hack telephones of individuals for financial gain, and show a callous disregard for the feelings of grieving relatives, democracy and the Rule of Law.
